title: Avan Jogia and girlfriend Cleopatra Coleman channel Angelina Jolie and Billy Bob Thornton
text:
Avan Jogia and his longtime girlfriend Cleopatra Coleman channeled one of the most bizarre red carpet couples at the Zombieland: Double Tap premiere.

Jogia, 27, and Coleman, 31, were clearly mimicking Angelina Jolie and Billy Bob Thornton at the 2000 world premiere of Gone in 60 Seconds.

The couple, who have been dating since September 2017, went to great lengths to recreate Jolie and Thornton's look, with Coleman even re-creating Jolie's tattoo.

Matching: Avan Jogia and Cleopatra Coleman were clearly mimicking Angelina Jolie and Billy Bob Thornton at the 2000 world premiere of Gone in 60 Seconds

Jogia matched Thornton's look with a long-sleeved brown paisley shirt, though with a slightly different pattern, plus dark brown leather pants and light brown boots.

He also wore a black baseball cap, though it didn't feature a logo like Thornton's, but the outfits were quite identical.

The actor, who portrays new character Berkeley in Zombieland: Double Tap, even seemed to style his facial hair in a similar way to Thornton.

Avan's look: Jogia matched Thornton's look with a long-sleeved brown paisley shirt, though with a slightly different pattern, plus dark brown leather pants and light brown boots

Coleman rocked a sleeveless powder blue top that slightly exposed her midriff, and the re-created tattoo design on her right arm, though her tattoo read Avan Jogia instead of Billy Bob.

She also matched Jolie's look with black leather pants with black heeled boots, as she was seen posing in nearly identical ways to Jolie's look.

The biggest difference between Jogia and Coleman, when compared to Jolie and Thornton, is that they're not married quite yet, like Jolie and Thornton were.

Iconic look: Coleman rocked a sleeveless powder blue top that slightly exposed her midriff, and the re-created tattoo design on her right arm, though her tattoo read Avan Jogia instead of Billy Bob

Happily married: The biggest difference between Jogia and Coleman, when compared to Jolie and Thornton, is that they're not married quite yet, like Jolie and Thornton were; Angelina and Billy Bob pictured in 2000

The Gone in 60 Seconds premiere took place in June 2000, just a month after they got married following just two months of dating.

The red carpet appearance was quite infamous, with Thornton admitting in an MTV interview that they had sex in the car on their way to the premiere.

Jolie and Thornton were married from June 2000 to June 2002, just months after they adopted Maddox from Cambodia.

Marriage: The Gone in 60 Seconds premiere took place in June 2000, just a month after they got married following just two months of dating

Jogia had previously dated Miley Cyrus and his Zombieland: Double Tap co-star Zoey Deutch, who he dated for five years before they split in January 2017.

Jogia and Coleman started dating in September 2017.

Zombieland: Double Tap hits theaters nationwide on October 18.
